body_html:
@jbarker-nvidia Right, so upon inspection this is the situation in THNN:

  • pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/unfold.c has unfolded_copy and unfolded_acc that are called from pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.c
  • pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricConvolutionMM.c has unfolded_copy_vol and unfolded_acc_vol

The ideal would be to clean things up a bit so that some symmetry is preserved both within THNN as well as between THNN and THCUNN. I'm looking into this.
body_text:
@jbarker-nvidia Right, so upon inspection this is the situation in THNN:

pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/unfold.c has unfolded_copy and unfolded_acc that are called from pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.c
pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricConvolutionMM.c has unfolded_copy_vol and unfolded_acc_vol

The ideal would be to clean things up a bit so that some symmetry is preserved both within THNN as well as between THNN and THCUNN. I'm looking into this.
body:
@jbarker-nvidia Right, so upon inspection this is the situation in THNN: 
- [pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/unfold.c]() has unfolded_copy and unfolded_acc that are called from [pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.c]()
- [pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricConvolutionMM.c]() has unfolded_copy_vol and unfolded_acc_vol

The ideal would be to clean things up a bit so that some symmetry is preserved both within THNN as well as between THNN and THCUNN. I'm looking into this.
